ground_truth: David's eyes open, and outside, the greenery is becoming a blur as the train is moving faster and shaking more than it did. He watches through the window and glances across the aisle at a man reading a book, who closes it and, like the woman beside him, begins to stare out of the window as the train shakes more violently. David looks up ahead and sees another passenger's hand reaching down to grab hold of an armrest. A car is driving down a quiet urban street, and in a living room, a boy lies over a sofa, his feet over the back, his head hanging down to the floor, flicking through TV channels with the remote, upside down. David slowly swings his legs over the side of a hospital trolley and sits up, and in front of him, a white bandaged figure is lying on another trolley. Dressed only in his shirt and trousers, David looks around uncertainly as a white-coated man carrying a clipboard, who has been standing by the other figure, walks towards David and is replaced by other medical staff. The man holds up a torch and examines David's eyes. David stares at the other trolley, and they both look at the person on the other trolley, whose chest is heaving unevenly. Still staring at the other figure, David slowly shakes his head and shakes his head again, watching a crimson stain slowly seeping through the bandages of the other passenger. David nods abstractedly as the crimson stain quickly spreads, and the other body heaves as blood forms a pool on top of the bandages. David walks stiffly down a hospital corridor lined with silent people standing, sitting, leaning against walls, many of them watching him and smiling. His son sees him, jumps up from the bench, and runs to him. David hugs his son to his chest, gives him a slight smile, and looks over his head at the slim fair-haired woman who has followed the boy. They stare at each other, and she moves forward and puts her head on his shoulder, his cheek against her hair. He puts his arm around her, gazing past her. She steps back, looks at David, then at the boy, her head on one side. The boy's lips move, and the three of them stand silently for a moment. Then the boy takes the woman's hand and puts it in his father's before setting off down the corridor. As his parents follow, they let go of each other's hands. A gaggle of reporters and photographers, one holding a long boom microphone, are standing inside the big double doors at the end of the corridor, and flashlights go off as David's family steps out into the open air.

test_cases.name: Synonym Substitution
test_cases.description:
Certainly! Here is the transformed text with synonyms:

David's eyes open, and outside, the foliage is becoming a blur as the locomotive is traveling swifter and vibrating more than it did. He observes through the pane and glances across the aisle at a gentleman perusing a volume, who shuts it and, like the lady beside him, commences to gaze out of the pane as the locomotive vibrates more fiercely. The man holds up a torch and examines David's eyes. David stares at the other gurney, and they both look at the person on the other gurney, whose chest is rising unevenly. Still staring at the other figure, David slowly shakes his head and shakes his head again, watching a scarlet stain slowly seeping through the bandages of the other traveler. David nods abstractedly as the scarlet stain quickly spreads, and the other body rises as blood forms a pool on top of the bandages. David walks stiffly down a hospital hallway lined with silent people standing, sitting, leaning against walls, many of them observing him and smiling. His son sees him, jumps up from the bench, and runs to him. David embraces his son to his chest, gives him a slight smile, and looks over his head at the slim fair-haired woman who has followed the boy. They gaze at each other, and she moves forward and puts her head on his shoulder, his cheek against her hair. He puts his arm around her, gazing past her. She steps back, looks at David, then at the boy, her head on one side. The boy's lips move, and the three of them stand silently for a moment. Then the boy takes the woman's hand and places it in his father's before setting off down the hallway. As his parents follow, they let go of each other's hands. A gaggle of journalists and photographers, one holding a long boom microphone, are standing inside the large double doors at the end of the hallway, and flashlights go off as David's family steps out into the open air.

test_cases.name: Brevity - L1
test_cases.description: David's eyes open, noticing the greenery outside blurring as the train accelerates and shakes more. He observes a man across the aisle closing his book and, like the woman beside him, staring out the window as the train shakes violently. Ahead, a passenger grips an armrest. A car moves down a quiet street, while a boy flicks through TV channels upside down on a sofa. David swings his legs over a hospital trolley and sits up, seeing a bandaged figure on another trolley. Wearing just a shirt and trousers, he looks around as a white-coated man with a clipboard approaches, replaced by other medical staff. The man examines David's eyes with a torch. David focuses on the other trolley, watching a crimson stain seep through bandages as the body heaves. Nodding abstractedly, he sees blood pooling on the bandages. Walking stiffly through a hospital corridor lined with silent people, David sees his son, who runs to him. David hugs him, smiles slightly, and looks at a slim fair-haired woman following the boy. They embrace, and she rests her head on his shoulder, then steps back. The boy puts her hand in David's before leading them down the corridor. As his parents follow, they release hands. Reporters and photographers, one with a boom microphone, wait at the corridor's end, flashing cameras as David's family steps into the open air.

test_cases.name: Brevity - L2
test_cases.description: David's eyes open as the train speeds up, shaking. Through the window, he notices a man across the aisle close his book to look outside. Another passenger grips an armrest. Meanwhile, a boy watches TV upside down in a living room while David, on a hospital trolley, sits up, sees a bandaged figure nearby, and a man examines his eyes. David observes blood seeping through the bandages, spreading quickly. He walks down a hospital corridor, where people watch him, smiling. His son runs to him, and David hugs him, exchanging a look with a fair-haired woman who rests her head on his shoulder. She steps back, and the boy joins their hands. As they walk, reporters and photographers capture the moment as David's family exits into the open air.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L1
test_cases.description:
David's eyes gently flutter open, and he immediately notices that outside the window, the lush greenery is transforming into an indistinct blur. The train is picking up speed and shaking more noticeably than before. He keeps his gaze fixed on the scenery rushing by before turning his attention to the aisle, where he observes a man engrossed in a book. This man closes the book with a decisive motion and joins the woman beside him in staring out of the window as the train's shaking grows increasingly intense. As David shifts his focus further ahead, he notices yet another passenger reaching down with a hand to grasp the armrest for stability. Meanwhile, elsewhere, a car makes its way down a serene urban street, seamlessly blending into its surroundings. In a quiet living room setting, a young boy sprawls over a sofa in an unconventional manner, his feet casually propped over the back while his head dangles toward the floor. He is flicking through the myriad of TV channels with a remote control, viewing the world upside down. 

Drawing himself slowly to an upright position, David swings his legs over the side of a hospital trolley and sits up, taking in his surroundings. Directly in front of him, another trolley bears a figure wrapped in white bandages. Clad only in his shirt and trousers, David looks around with a sense of uncertainty. A man outfitted in a white coat, carrying a clipboard, who has been standing vigil by the bandaged figure, now approaches David, momentarily replaced by other attentive medical personnel. The man raises a small torch and meticulously examines David's eyes. David, in turn, fixes his gaze on the other trolley, noting how its occupant's chest rises and falls with an uneven rhythm. He remains transfixed, slowly shaking his head, his focus on the crimson stain that stealthily begins to seep through the bandages covering the other passenger. With a nod of abstract understanding, he watches as the crimson stain rapidly spreads, and the other body heaves unsettlingly as blood pools atop the bandages. 

David makes his way stiffly down a hospital corridor. It is lined with silent individuals standing, sitting, or leaning against the walls, many of whom watch him pass by, some offering warm smiles. Among the onlookers, his son sees him, leaps up from a bench, and eagerly runs toward him. In response, David gathers his son into a tender embrace, offering him a slight, reassuring smile. His gaze then shifts over his son's head to a slim, fair-haired woman who has followed closely behind the boy. Their eyes meet, and she steps forward to rest her head on his shoulder, her cheek nestled against his hair. Returning her affection, he places an arm around her, his eyes gazing past her. After a moment, she steps back, looking from David to the boy, her head thoughtfully tilted to one side. The boy's lips move silently, and the three of them stand momentarily in a still, silent tableau. Eventually, the boy takes the woman's hand and places it into his father's, leading the way down the corridor. As they follow his lead, the parents release their hold on each other. A crowd of reporters and photographers, one of whom wields a long boom microphone, is stationed behind the large double doors at the corridor's end. As David and his family emerge into the fresh open air, camera flashlights burst into life, capturing the moment.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L2
test_cases.description:
David's eyes slowly and gently flutter open to the world around him, and he immediately becomes aware of the rapidly changing scenery outside the window. Outside, the lush, vibrant greenery is transforming into an indistinct, blurred panorama. The train is steadily picking up speed, shaking and rattling more noticeably than it did before. He keeps his gaze intently fixed on the scenery rushing by in a blur before he turns his attention to the aisle, where he observes a man deeply engrossed in reading a book. This man closes the book with a decisive motion and joins the woman beside him, both now staring out of the window as the train's shaking grows increasingly intense. As David shifts his focus further down the aisle, he notices yet another passenger, reaching down with a hand to grasp the armrest, seeking a sense of stability amid the movement. Meanwhile, elsewhere, in a distant part of the world, a car makes its way along a serene urban street, seamlessly blending into its surroundings as it moves. In a quiet living room setting, a young boy sprawls in an unconventional manner across a sofa, his feet casually propped over the back while his head dangles toward the floor. He flicks through myriad TV channels with a remote control in hand, seeing the world from an upside-down perspective. 

Drawing himself slowly to a more upright position, David swings his legs over the side of a hospital trolley and sits up, taking in his surroundings with a mix of confusion and curiosity. Directly in front of him, another trolley bears a figure wrapped meticulously in white bandages. Clad only in his shirt and trousers, David looks around with a palpable sense of uncertainty. A man, outfitted in a white coat and carrying a clipboard, who has been standing vigilantly by the bandaged figure, now turns his attention to David, temporarily replaced by other attentive and busy medical personnel. The man raises a small torch and meticulously examines David's eyes with a practiced, careful gaze. David, in turn, fixes his own gaze on the other trolley, noting how its occupant's chest rises and falls with an uneven rhythm. He remains transfixed, slowly shaking his head, his focus unwavering on the crimson stain that stealthily begins to seep through the bandages covering the other passenger. With a nod of abstract understanding, he watches as the crimson stain rapidly spreads, and the other body heaves unsettlingly as blood pools atop the bandages, creating a deeply unsettling image. 

David makes his way stiffly and deliberately down a hospital corridor. It is lined with silent individuals standing, sitting, or leaning against the walls, many of whom watch his progress as he passes by, with some offering warm, encouraging smiles. Among the onlookers, his son catches sight of him, leaps up energetically from a bench, and eagerly runs toward him. In response, David gathers his son into a tender, heartfelt embrace, offering him a gentle, reassuring smile. His gaze then shifts over his son's head to a slim, fair-haired woman who has followed closely behind the boy. Their eyes meet meaningfully, and she steps forward to rest her head comfortably on his shoulder, her cheek nestled affectionately against his hair. Returning her affection, he places an arm around her, his eyes gazing thoughtfully past her. After a moment, she steps back, looking from David to the boy, her head thoughtfully tilted to one side, indicating her reflective state of mind. The boy's lips move silently, and the three of them stand together in a still, silent tableau, a moment of quiet shared understanding. Eventually, the boy takes the woman's hand and places it into his father's, leading the way down the corridor toward the outside world. As they follow his lead, the parents release their gentle hold on each other. A crowd of reporters and photographers, one of whom wields a long boom microphone, is stationed behind the large double doors at the corridor's end. As David and his family finally emerge into the fresh open air outside, camera flashlights burst into life, capturing the poignant moment for posterity.

test_cases.name: Macro-Actions -> Micro-Actions
test_cases.description: David's eyes slowly open and his gaze is immediately drawn to the window, where he notices the lush greenery outside transforming into a blur, indicating that the train is picking up speed and shaking more vigorously than before. He intensely observes the scenery, then shifts his attention across the aisle where he notices a man absorbed in his book. The man, sensing the increasing turbulence, closes his book and, mimicking the actions of the woman seated next to him, diverts his attention outside, staring through the window as the train's shaking grows more intense. David's eyes then shift to the front, watching as another passenger's hand descends deliberately to grip an armrest tightly. Meanwhile, on a nearby quiet urban street, a car cruises by serenely. Simultaneously, in a cozy living room, a young boy reclines on a sofa in an unusual position, his legs draped over the backrest and his head dangling toward the floor. With an upside-down remote in his hand, he cycles through TV channels with a flick. Back on the train, David gingerly swings his legs over the side of a hospital trolley and slowly sits up, orienting himself to his surroundings. In front of him, he sees a figure wrapped entirely in white bandages lying motionless on another trolley. Clad in only a shirt and trousers, David surveys his surroundings unsurely until his attention is drawn to a white-coated man holding a clipboard, who has been standing beside the other figure. This man approaches David as other medical staff replace him by the bandaged figure. The man raises a small torch, meticulously examining David's eyes. David keeps his gaze fixed on the other trolley, noting the person lying there with a chest rising and falling erratically. Still focused on the bandaged figure, he gradually shakes his head in disbelief as a vivid crimson stain begins to creep through the fabric of the bandages. He nods in an abstract manner as the dark red quickly spreads and the body beneath heaves, a pool of blood forming ominously on the surface. David then walks with a rigid gait down a hospital corridor, its walls lined with silent individuals standing, sitting, or leaning, many of whom watch him with faint smiles. His son, noticing him, springs up from a bench and rushes towards him. David envelops his son in a warm embrace, offering him a gentle smile before directing his gaze over the boy’s head toward a slender, fair-haired woman who is following closely. Their eyes meet, and she steps forward, resting her head on his shoulder, his cheek brushing against her hair. He enfolds her in his embrace, looking past her with a distant expression. She pulls back and directs her attention toward David, then at the boy, slightly inclining her head. The boy's lips move silently, and the trio stands in a moment of shared silence. Subsequently, the boy takes the woman's hand and places it in his father's, then begins to walk down the corridor. As the parents trail behind, they gradually release each other's hands. At the end of the corridor, a throng of reporters and photographers gathers, one wielding a long boom microphone. As David's family steps out into the open air, camera flashlights erupt in a frenzy around them.

test_cases.name: Micro-Actions -> Macro-Actions
test_cases.description:
David awakens to the sight of greenery blurring past the train window as it gains speed and shakiness. Observing fellow passengers reacting to the turbulence, he notes a man across the aisle closing his book to peer outside and another passenger gripping an armrest. Simultaneously, in a different setting, a car travels a quiet urban street while a boy casually flips TV channels upside down on a sofa. Transitioning to a hospital scene, David carefully sits up on a trolley, noticing a bandaged figure on another trolley. He uncertainly surveys his surroundings as a white-coated man approaches with a torch to examine his eyes, while medical staff attend to the other figure whose chest is heaving unevenly beneath crimson-stained bandages. As the stain spreads, David abstractedly nods and watches the grim scene unfold.

Later, David walks through a hospital corridor lined with silent onlookers, met by his son who eagerly runs to embrace him. Sharing a moment with his son, David acknowledges a fair-haired woman following the boy. They embrace, and then, after a silent exchange, the boy links their hands before leading them down the corridor. As they step into the open air, releasing each other's hands, they are met by a throng of reporters and photographers capturing the moment with flashing lights.

test_cases.name: Insert Attributes, Emotions and Scene
test_cases.description:
David's eyes open, and outside, the greenery of the English countryside is becoming a blur as the train, one of the high-speed models, is moving faster and shaking more than it did. He watches through the window and glances across the aisle at a man reading a book, a bestseller by an acclaimed author, who closes it and, like the woman beside him, begins to stare out of the window as the train shakes more violently. David looks up ahead and sees another passenger's hand, with a silver ring glinting, reaching down to grab hold of an armrest. 

A car, a small sedan with a slightly rusted bumper, is driving down a quiet urban street in the early hours of the morning, and in a living room illuminated by the flickering glow of the television, a boy lies over a sofa, his feet over the back, his head hanging down to the floor, flicking through TV channels with the remote, upside down, a common way for him to unwind after school. David, disoriented, slowly swings his legs over the side of a hospital trolley and sits up, and in front of him, a white bandaged figure is lying on another trolley. Dressed only in his shirt and trousers, remnants of a formal event the night before, David looks around uncertainly as a white-coated man carrying a clipboard, identifying him as a doctor, who has been standing by the other figure, walks towards David and is replaced by other medical staff. The man holds up a torch, often used in medical exams, and examines David's eyes for signs of head trauma. 

David stares at the other trolley, and they both look at the person on the other trolley, whose chest is heaving unevenly. Still staring at the other figure, David slowly shakes his head and shakes his head again, watching a crimson stain slowly seeping through the bandages of the other passenger, a sign of serious internal bleeding. David nods abstractedly as the crimson stain quickly spreads, and the other body heaves as blood forms a pool on top of the bandages, indicating critical condition. 

David walks stiffly down a hospital corridor, which is part of a renowned medical center, lined with silent people standing, sitting, leaning against walls, many of them watching him and smiling in relief and encouragement. His son, who always ran to greet him with enthusiasm, sees him, jumps up from the bench, and runs to him. David hugs his son to his chest, gives him a slight smile, and looks over his head at the slim fair-haired woman who has followed the boy, his wife, who had waited anxiously for news. They stare at each other, and she moves forward and puts her head on his shoulder, his cheek against her hair, inhaling the familiar scent that had comforted him for years. He puts his arm around her, gazing past her at the bustling hospital scene. She steps back, looks at David, then at the boy, her head on one side, expressing her concern through her gentle mannerisms. The boy's lips move, whispering reassurances, and the three of them stand silently for a moment. 

Then the boy takes the woman's hand and puts it in his father's before setting off down the corridor, guiding them toward the exit. As his parents follow, they let go of each other's hands, a silent promise to continue together. A gaggle of reporters and photographers, one holding a long boom microphone capturing every sound, are standing inside the big double doors at the end of the corridor, which lead out of the hospital, and flashlights go off in a flurry as David's family steps out into the open air, signifying the end of their ordeal under the public eye.

test_cases.name: Deletion (~50%)
test_cases.description: David's eyes open and outside the greenery is becoming a blur as the train is moving faster and shaking more than it did. He watches through the window and glances across the aisle at a man reading a book who closes it and like the woman beside him begins to stare out of the window as the train shakes more violently. David looks up ahead and sees another passenger's hand reaching down to grab hold of an armrest. A car is driving down a quiet urban street and in a living room a boy lies over a sofa his feet over the back his head hanging down to the floor flicking through TV channels with the remote upside down. David slowly swings his legs over the side of a hospital trolley and sits up and in front of him a white bandaged figure is lying on another trolley. She steps back looks at David then at the boy her head on one side. The boy's lips move and the three of them stand silently for a moment. Then the boy takes the woman's hand and puts it in his father's before setting off down the corridor. As his parents follow they let go of each other's hands. A gaggle of reporters and photographers one holding a long boom microphone are standing inside the big double doors at the end of the corridor and flashlights go off as David's family steps out into the open air.

test_cases.name: Deletion (~80%)
test_cases.description: David's eyes open and outside the greenery is becoming a blur as the train is moving faster and shaking more than it did. He watches through the window and glances across the aisle at a man reading a book who closes it and like the woman beside him begins to stare out of the window as the train shakes more violently. As his parents follow they let go of each other's hands. A gaggle of reporters and photographers one holding a long boom microphone are standing inside the big double doors at the end of the corridor and flashlights go off as David's family steps out into the open air.

test_cases.name: Subject-Action-Object Corruption
test_cases.description: Samantha's ears twitch open, and indoors, the wallpaper is transforming into a haze as the helicopter is drifting slower and shimmering less than it did. She peers through the curtain and glimpses across the room at a cat knitting a scarf, who unravels it and, like the dog beside it, begins to bark out of the curtain as the helicopter shimmers more softly. Samantha glances over her shoulder and notices another raccoon's paw reaching up to pat hold of a lampshade. A bicycle is gliding up a bustling park path, and in a classroom, a girl sprawls under a desk, her hands under the chair, her eyes gazing up to the ceiling, blipping through comic pages with a feather, right side up. Samantha slowly scuttles her paws under the edge of a massage chair and rolls over, and beside her, a polka-dotted mannequin is propped on another chair. Clad only in her jacket and leggings, Samantha glances around curiously as a denim-wrapped woman carrying a typewriter, who has been lounging beside the mannequin, skips towards Samantha and is followed by other yoga instructors. The woman raises up a magnifying glass and measures Samantha's ears. Samantha glares at the other chair, and they both glance at the mannequin on the other chair, whose hands are swaying erratically. Still glaring at the mannequin, Samantha slowly nods her ears and nods her ears again, scrutinizing a turquoise glow slowly spreading through the polka dots of the other raccoon. Samantha shrugs dreamily as the turquoise glow swiftly swells, and the other mannequin sways as paint forms a puddle on top of the polka dots. Samantha skates gracefully through a spa lobby filled with yawning cats sitting, lying on floors, many of them gazing at her and waving. Her cousin watches her, flips up from the hammock, and skips to her. Samantha hugs her cousin to her ankles, gives her a gentle frown, and glances over her shoulder at the tiny dark-haired bird who has trailed the girl. They gaze at one another, and she hops backward and puts her foot on her elbow, her elbow against her wing. She lifts her paw around her, staring beyond her. She leaps away, glances at Samantha, then at the girl, her knee on one knee. The girl's toes wiggle, and the trio stand loudly for a moment. Then the girl clasps the bird's wing and places it in her cousin's before gliding down the lobby. As her cousins trail, they release each other's wings. A parade of bakers and sculptors, one holding a long feather duster, are reclining under the tiny single tunnels at the far side of the lobby, and lanterns blink on as Samantha's family drifts into the deep sea.

test_cases.name: Complete Corruption
test_cases.description: The film starts with a man waking up in a small apartment. He prepares coffee and checks his phone for messages. There are none, so he heads out to catch a bus. On the way, he passes a neighbor who greets him briefly. At the bus stop, he notices a group of students talking about an upcoming test. He boards the bus and sits near the back, watching the city pass by outside the window. After a few stops, he gets off near a large office building. He enters the lobby and goes through security. He rides an elevator to the tenth floor, where he works as an assistant. His manager asks him to prepare some documents for a meeting later in the day. He collects files from different departments and organizes them in a conference room. Another employee asks him for help with a software issue, so he takes a few minutes to fix it. Then he returns to the conference room to double-check everything before the meeting begins. The meeting starts at noon. Several people join via video call, and others sit around the table. The manager outlines the project goals, and each team member shares updates on their tasks. There are questions about deadlines and budgets, but no big surprises. After an hour, they end the call. The manager thanks everyone and leaves. The assistant cleans up the room, collects leftover notes, and heads back to his desk. During lunch, he walks to a nearby café, where he orders a simple meal. He eats alone and checks social media on his phone. After lunch, he returns to the office and finishes smaller tasks, such as sending emails and filing paperwork. He also helps a coworker carry boxes of supplies to another floor. Later in the afternoon, the manager calls him in to discuss next week's schedule. They go over a few changes, and the assistant updates the calendar. When the workday ends, he logs off his computer and leaves the building. Outside, he walks a few blocks to meet a friend. They chat about weekend plans and decide to see a film on Saturday. The assistant then heads home on a crowded bus. At his apartment, he sorts his mail, feeds a pet cat, and warms up leftovers for dinner. He watches a short news segment on TV, then checks his phone again. A message from his friend confirms their plan for the weekend. He feels relieved to have something to look forward to. The film ends with him preparing for bed, setting an alarm, and turning off the lights. He reflects briefly on the day, thinking about his tasks, his quiet home, and the plans ahead.

test_cases.name: Summarization
test_cases.description: David opens his eyes to a blurred view of greenery as the train shakes violently. He notices passengers, including a man with a book, staring out the window. Meanwhile, a boy flicks TV channels upside down at home. David, on a hospital trolley, sits up to see a bandaged figure nearby. A white-coated man examines David's eyes while a crimson stain spreads on the other patient's bandages, pooling with blood. David walks stiffly down a corridor lined with silent onlookers, who watch him and smile. His son runs to him, and David embraces him, then shares a meaningful glance with the boy's mother. She places her head on his shoulder before stepping back, and the boy places her hand in David's. They silently walk down the corridor together. Reporters and photographers await them at the double doors, capturing their exit into the open air.
